profile.presentation: I am a web developer based in France. I have a passion for web design and love to create for web and mobile devices.

php.title: PHP 7.4 / 8.2
php.description: I started coding by learning PHP. I worked with frameworks like Symfony.

symfony5.title: Symfony 5
symfony5.description: Symfony was my first PHP framework. I've worked with components such as Twig, Doctrine and so on.

reactJs.title: React JS
reactJs.description: React JS is my first JavaScript library. I've worked with libraries such as Redux, React Router and others.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: I learned TypeScript working with React JS.

redux.title: Redux
redux.description: I learned Redux and Redux Toolkit while working with React JS.

github.title: GitHub
github.description: I use Github for my personal projects and tests.

gitlab.title: GitLab
gitlab.description: I use Gitlab for my professional and personal projects, CI / CD, etc...

nextjs.title: Next JS
nextjs.description: I learned Next JS by working with React JS.

docker.title: Docker
docker.description: I learned about Docker by working with Symfony in my company.

stripe.title: Stripe
stripe.description: I learned how to use Stripe by working with Symfony in a corporate environment.

strapi.title: Strapi
strapi.description: I learned how to use Strapi by working with React JS in a company.

nodejs.title: Node JS
nodejs.description: I learned Node JS by working with React JS on MERN projects.

expressjs.title: Express JS
expressjs.description: I learned Express JS by working with React JS on MERN projects.

linux.title: Linux
linux.description: I use Linux to work on my personal and professional projects.

apple.title: Mac OS
apple.description: I started coding on Mac OS. But I switched to Linux to work on my personal and professional projects.

mysql.title: MySQL
mysql.description: I learned Mysql by working with Symfony.
